name: Alvear Art Hotel
description: Alvear Art Hotel is a modern 17-floor building located in the financial, commercial and cultural heart of the city, next to the historic Plaza San Martin.

name: Globales Republica
address: Hotel in Downtown Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires
description: In the heart of downtown Buenos Aires directly opposite the Obelisk, Globales Republica features an a la carte restaurant and a bar where guests can relax with an evening drink.

name: Best Western Estacion Central
description: Located in Santiago, 1.2 miles from Museo de la Memoria Santiago, Best Western Estacion Central has accommodations with a shared lounge, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Santiago Airport
description: Located a 5-minute drive from Santiago International Airport, Hilton Garden Inn Santiago Airport offers free Wi-Fi and a swimming pool in Santiago. The hotel is a 20-minute drive from the city center....

name: ibis budget Santiago Providencia
description: Located in Santiago, 1.4 miles from Patio Bellavista, ibis budget Santiago Providencia provides accommodations with free bikes, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace.

name: Hotel Panamericano
description: The Hotel Panamericano, located in the central area of Santiago, is an excellent option for those looking for comfort and convenience.

name: Icon Hotel
description: Offering rooftop swimming pool with panoramic views of the Andes mountains, Icon Hotel is located in Santiago, in the Las Condes district. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant and rooftop bar.

name: Solace Hotel Santiago
description: Boasting a fantastic location 1 block from Pedro de Valdivia Subway Station, Solace Hotel Santiago offers accommodations in the Providencia district of Santiago. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

name: Mercure Santiago Centro
description: This 4-star hotel offers spacious accommodations in a central location in Santiago. It is next to a subway station and near Cerro Santa Lucia, Plaza de Armas and Palacio de La Moneda.

name: ibis Santiago Providencia
description: Only 328 feet from Manuel Montt Metro Station, Ibis Santiago Providencia offers rooms in the Providencia district, in Santiago. It features a restaurant and a bar.

name: MR Hotel Providencia (ex Hotel Neruda)
description: The 4-star MR Hotel Providencia (ex Hotel Neruda) offers a blend of classical and contemporary décor in Santiago's upscale Providencia neighborhood, 11 mi from Benitez Airport.

name: Ola Santiago Providencia, Tapestry Collection by Hilton
description: Located in Santiago, a 8-minute walk from Costanera Center, Ola Santiago Providencia, Tapestry Collection by Hilton provides accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a...
